turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you help me place a order for pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course it would be my pleasure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it and what toppings for each of them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a plain cheese pizza for one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like just pepperoni on the second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and a chicken alfredo for the third.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any add ons or extras?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like thin crust for the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, one cheese, one classic pep, and one chicken alfredo, all with thin crusts is the order, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, that'll be $65.45 alright?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll send you the reciept via text and it will be ready in 30minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too.
